{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Peak and off-peak times"}
We charge higher fares at the busiest times of the day.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Using pay as you go"}
On Tube, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail services in London:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003ePeak fares\u003c/strong\u003e - Monday to Friday (not on public holidays) between 06:30 and 09:30, and between 16:00 and 19:00","\u003cstrong\u003eOff-peak fares\u003c/strong\u003e - at all other times and if you travel from a station outside Zone 1 to a station in Zone 1 between 16:00 and 19:00, Monday to Friday"]}
If you're travelling on London Overground between Euston (National Rail station) and Watford Junction:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003ePeak fares\u003c/strong\u003e - from Watford Junction towards Euston (Southbound), Monday to Friday between 06:30 and 09:30 (not on public holidays). From Euston towards Watford Junction (Northbound), peak fares apply Monday to Friday between 16:00 and 19:00 (not on public holidays)","\u003cstrong\u003eOff-peak fares\u003c/strong\u003e - at all other times"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Using Day Travelcards"}
Peak and off-peak times change for different Day Travelcards :

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eAnytime Day Travelcards\u003c/strong\u003e - use for the whole day (for the date printed on your ticket) and for journeys starting before 04:30 the next day","\u003cstrong\u003eOff-peak Day Travelcards\u003c/strong\u003e - use for the whole day from 09:30, Monday to Friday, or anytime on Saturdays, Sundays or public holidays (for the date printed on your ticket), and for journeys starting before 04:30 the next day"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Using our night services"}
Our Night Tube and London Overground Night Service fares are always off-peak.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Travelling in a group"}
If you're travelling in a group of ten or more, you can buy paper Group Day Travelcards .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Group Day Travelcard prices"}

{"template":"table","rows":[["\u003cstrong\u003eZone  \u003c/strong\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eAdult \u003c/strong\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eUnder 16s\u003c/strong\u003e "],["1-6","£8.60","£4.30"],["1-9","£9.20","£4.60"]]}
